name: Carrot Rescue
description:
Carrot Rescue - you play the role of a farmer who must harvest his carrot crop before winter comes. However, there are various obstacles on your way: wild animals that are trying to eat your crops and evil farmers who want to steal it.

Your task is to protect your crops using throwing weapons. And also give selection to your enemies and wild animals.

Will you be able to protect your harvest from beasts and evil farmers and harvest all the carrots on time? Head to your farm and take on the challenge of protecting your carrot harvest!

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Various levels
- Good soundtrack
